caption: Figure 1: (a) A visual description of the sub-optimal problem of distribution-based method, where the blue box is high-quality nucleus of Top-P sampling and the xd is the draft token. (b) The CD verification algorithm. q(x) and p(x) denote distribution of draft model and target model, respectively. The Îµ is the approximate convergence loss in the training phase of target model.
reason: Shows conceptual overviews of two decoding methods in diagrammatic form.
